hasDitaContent.@value: Rosuvastatin increases the anticoagulant effect of acenocoumarol. Manufacturer advises monitor INR and adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Rosuvastatin   increases   the anticoagulant effect of   acenocoumarol .  Manufacturer advises monitor INR and adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Oral antacids decrease the absorption of oral rosuvastatin. Manufacturer advises separate administration by 2 hours.
